description:
This course is about the most important concept of accounting that is "Accounting Cycle". The course is designed for all learners who want to know the basic and key concepts to record transactions in order to make financial statements for a company or business. It has 8 sections mainly covering all important concepts in 14 lectures. The concepts taught are as follows:

  • Recording transactions
  • Ledger Accounts
  • Trial Balance
  • Adjusting Entries
  • Ten Column Worksheet
  • Income Statement
  • Balance sheet

The students can have the notes related to the course and the questions taught in the course. They will have quizzes and finally a self-assessment question to know their skills if improved or not.

In short, this course is a comprehensive understanding of daily, monthly or yearly business transactions and then finally making financial statements.

Students can take the advantage of learning the basic concepts required to begin and then use advanced methods to understand and apply concepts in just 60 minutes.

So, Get Ready! This is where you will learn preparing financial statements and core topic of Business Accounting.
title: Accounting Cycle: Learn the concepts in 60 minutes
